member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Azure.Secrets.AzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageHealthExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods to configure health monitoring probes and diagnostics.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Azure.Secrets.AzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageHealthExtensions.DefaultDiagnosticName
member.summary: The default name used for diagnostics.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Azure.Secrets.AzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageHealthExtensions.AddAzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageSecretDiagnostic(Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthProbesBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Adds a diagnostic for the specified Azure KeyVault Secrets Storage secret.
member.param: The name of the secret that should be diagnosed.
The service name. If null, the default service will be diagnosed.
The health probe name. If not specified will be used.
member.remarks: This diagnostic executes an operation on to determine whether the specified secret exists.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Azure.Secrets.AzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageHealthExtensions.AddAzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageKeyDiagnostic(Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthProbesBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Adds a diagnostic for the specified Azure KeyVault Secrets Storage key.
member.param: The name of the key that should be diagnosed.
The service name. If null, the default service will be diagnosed.
The health probe name. If not specified will be used.
member.remarks: This diagnostic executes an operation on to determine whether the specified key exists.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Azure.Secrets.AzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageHealthExtensions.AddAzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageCertificateDiagnostic(Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthProbesBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Adds a diagnostic for the specified Azure KeyVault Secrets Storage certificate.
member.param: The name of the certificate that should be diagnosed.
The service name. If null, the default service will be diagnosed.
The health probe name. If not specified will be used.
member.remarks: This diagnostic executes an operation on to determine whether the specified certificate exists. If the certificate exists but is expired, the diagnostic will report an unhealthy status.
